document.full_text: peru's left-wing nationalist ollanta humala and right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori are running almost neck-and-neck ahead of a june 5 presidential run-off election, a poll by lima's catholic university showed on saturday.
document.title: peru poll shows humala and fujimori in virtual tie
lines_and_colors: peru's left-wing nationalist ollanta humala and right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori are running almost neck-and-neck ahead of a june 5 presidential run-off election, a poll by lima's catholic university showed on saturday.
